summary: A small mod aimed at improving Riverwood\'s, interior lighting, exterior lighting, improving the density of forests, adding new features, improving NPC clothing, and much more coming in V1.5 and at user request.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=red][size=48]Improved Riverwood[/size][/color][/center]

[center]This as my first mod I tried to stay small, however I think It evolved into something quite nice. The highlight of this mod in my opinion is much improved interior lighting, no more are interior dull and shadow-less, now they are full of color and shadows. Bethesda it seemed did take much care for lighting as I\'ve found it was done quite poorly, I.E. Having a light source randomly put the center of room without a candle or some kind fire of the sort, quite bad if you ask me. However I didn\'t want to stop there, I also aimed to improve the NPC\'s clothing to add a bit more flavor, Faendal for example is now wearing a hunting armor configuration. Him being a ranger class I only saw it fitting for him to have the proper garb. I have also improved the forests around Riverwood. I added many more trees, shrubs, and plants and varied the size of existing foliage to give it more verity and flavor, the difference is astounding.[/center]

[center][color=Green][size=48]Full Feature List with Upcoming Features[/size][/color][/center]

-Improved Interior Lighting
-Improved Exterior Lighting
-Improved the density of Forests
-Improved NPC clothing
-Added an Archery range
-Improved the entrance a tad (all 3)
-Still kept the feel of Riverwood
- Many more coming in V1.5 and at user request.


[center][color=Blue][size=48]Bug List[/size][/color][/center]
-Tree sticking through a rock, roadside, south of Riverwood.
-Floating trees by river

If know of anymore please do not hesitate to bring them forward.

[center][color=Purple][size=48]Planned Features[/size][/color][/center]
-Enchantment Table to Sleeping Giant Inn[X]
-Spell, alchemy, and enchantment merchant. [X]
-Improve Alvor\'s item stock. [ ]
-Bunkhouse. [ ]
-Add more wildlife and hunters around Riverwood. [ ]
-Add Gates to all 3 entrances [X]
author: BuffCareBear
